article.headline: Radford 66, Howard 65
article.story: WASHINGTON (AP) -- Whit Holcomb-Faye scored a career-high 37 points -- including the game-winning shot with 3 seconds left -- to lead Radford to a 66-65 victory over Howard on Saturday. Louis Ford's final shot at the buzzer for Howard went in and out. He led the Bison (2-3) with 21 points, also a career-best. The win snapped a three-game losing streak for the Highlanders (3-4). Holcomb-Faye scored 25 points in the second half, and 12 of his team's last 14. Radford successfully contained Howard junior forward James Wilkinson, who came into the game averaging 18 points per game but managed only eight, all in the second half.
